attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we building workers in the hunderds of thousands are facing 
poverty and the loss of our homes over
the next months.
unless the prime minister acts now to 
create jobs for us,we will be homeless,and dependent of state benefits.the constrution infrastructure will dissappear and will bring misery on us for years.
we urge the prime minister to value us as much as he does the banks.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
